name: 葉賜旭
objective: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
schedule:
(Week 01)Introduction (1)
(Week 02)Introduction (2)
(Week 03)Rigid motions and Homogeneous Transformations (1)
(Week 04)Rigid motions and Homogeneous Transformations (2)
(Week 05)Rigid motions and Homogeneous Transformations (3)
(Week 06)Forward and Inverse Kinematics (1)
(Week 07)Forward and Inverse Kinematics (2)
(Week 08)Forward and Inverse Kinematics (3)
(Week 10)Velocity Kinematics (1)
(Week 11)Velocity Kinematics (2)
(Week 12)Independent Joint Control
(Week 13)Path and Trajectory Planning
(Week 14)Dynamics (1)
(Week 15)Dynamics (2)
(Week 16)Dynamics (3)
(Week 17)Multivariable and Force Control
scorePolicy: 期中考佔40%，期末考佔40%，作業報告佔20%
materials: Robot Modeling and Control, M. K. Spong, S. Hutchinson, M. Vidyasagar, WILEY, 2006.
